info.description: API for Mile-Do, simple clone of TickTick.
info.title: Mile-Do API

201.description: Recurring tasks template has been removed

patch.description: update existing recurring tasks template by :id

get.description: get count of completed tasks over total tasks for today
get user account by bearer token

time.description: Time zone will be ignored when encoding to PostgreSQL.

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
